A '''polished blackstone brick wall''' is a [[polished blackstone brick]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished blackstone brick walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Polished Blackstone Brick Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Polished blackstone brick walls generate naturally within [[ruined portal]]s that generate in [[the Nether]].
